      @Transactional(readOnly=true) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\') and principal.username == username") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Measurement> getMeasurementsByIntervalGrouped(String deviceName, String username, Instant start, Instant end, ChronoUnit timeUnit, ZoneId timezone)

      Specified by:
